full_summary:
# Professional Services Required to Enhance CPPD Program Service Delivery
==============================================

**Reference:** cb-6632-95986348

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

### Call Details

* **Notice Date:** 2023-06-22
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-07-06 @ 2:00 PM EDT (now expired)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-07-27
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-31

### Tender Scope

The objective of this work is to identify options for improving the service delivery approach of the Canada Pension Plan Disability (CPPD) program. The services of a professional consulting team are required to:

* Review and redesign the CPPD service delivery approach to enhance people, processes, and technology.
* Develop a roadmap to achieve the current Continuous Improvement agenda and future-state objectives related to CPPD delivery.
* Support the implementation of the new service delivery approach within the option period.

### Evaluation Criteria

The selection will be based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Additional Information

This tender is open to Canadian contractors that have demonstrated experience in change management, communication, and advisory services. Contractors must also comply with the requirements of the Government of Canada's procurement process.

### Requirements

* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, among others.
* **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR).
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR).

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Stephanie Lane at nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca.

### Attachments

* The complete tender notice can be downloaded from [CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6632/100022606---npp.pdf). Please note that it is your responsibility to ensure that you have read and understood the requirements in this document before submitting your proposal. junilul1994@outlook.com
